dialogue.text: You want to know why I brought you here, Sonic?!
It's for revenge. Revenge for my dreams, myself and my squad. That which you and your resistance took down!
So don't play with me, Sonic! You've known this from the start!
Revenge won't fix anything, Infinite! I wonâ€™t allow you to destroy this world!
You'll never understand, Sonic, and with the Phantom Ruby fully recharged...
